items.headline: Carvana gets a spot in the S&P 500 ahead of these tech stocks
items.summary_en: Carvana and two other companies will join the S&P 500 in about two weeks, S&P Dow Jones Indices said late Friday — dashing the hopes of those investors who expected bigger tech names or a crypto giant to get the honors this time around.
